item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. An NFC movie library for my kids (548 points | 115 comments)
2. Is telling a model to "not hallucinate" absurd? (19 points | 24 comments)
3. Radiology-specific foundation model (102 points | 37 comments)
4. Warner Brothers Cartoon Companion (30 points | discuss)
5. Windows NT vs. Unix: A design comparison (394 points | 321 comments)
6. Affordable DE10-Nano compatible boards for MiSTer FPGA retro platform (80 points | 18 comments)

8. Sigrok – a portable, cross-platform, FOSS signal analysis software suite (93 points | 10 comments)
9. 2016 was first year on record for zero roof fall fatalities in coal mining in US (10 points | 2 comments)
10. Sqlc: Compile SQL to type-safe code (139 points | 56 comments)
11. Project Hammer: reduce collusion in the Canadian grocery sector (285 points | 191 comments)
12. DOJ claims Google has "trifecta of monopolies" on Day 1 of ad tech trial (212 points | 139 comments)
13. Launch HN: Deepsilicon (YC S24) – Software and hardware for ternary transformers (156 points | 57 comments)
14. Show HN: Vomitorium – all of your project in 1 text file (14 points | 5 comments)

17. Just for Fun (2022) (221 points | 55 comments)
18. Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin discovered that stars are mostly made of hydrogen (68 points | 16 comments)

20. B-Trees and Database Indexes (214 points | 37 comments)
21. EU Court: Apple received EUR 13B illegal tax subsidy [pdf] (7 points | discuss)
22. Transfusion: Predict the next token and diffuse images with one multimodal model (90 points | 5 comments)
23. Tech Apple loses EU court battle over 13B euro tax bill in Ireland (6 points | discuss)
24. Synthetic diamonds are now purer, more beautiful, and cheaper than mined (640 points | 358 comments)
25. Hacking misconfigured AWS S3 buckets: A complete guide (200 points | 38 comments)
26. Why GitHub won (470 points | 399 comments)
27. Japan gives $2.4B in incentives to Toyota and more for EV battery making (34 points | 35 comments)
28. Every webpage deserves to be a place (97 points | 29 comments)
29. Talaria: Interactively Optimizing Machine Learning Models for Efficient Inferenc (26 points | 1 comment)
30. FTC Pushed to Crack Down on Companies That Ruin Hardware via Software Updates (326 points | 137 comments)
